author: Brenda Goh
title: China's Wuhan, where the coronavirus emerged, begins to lift its lockdown
description: The Chinese city of Wuhan, where the coronavirus outbreak first emerged, began lifting a two-month lockdown on Saturday by restarting some metro services and reopening borders, allowing some semblance of normality to return and families to reunite.
